trans-unit.source: Provides the base functionality for creating collections.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于创建集合的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class and its members are not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as the class from which other collection classes derive standard functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>类及其成员不适用于进行作独立组件，而应用作其他哪个集合类派生标准功能的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class and its members are not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as the class from which other collection classes derive standard functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>类及其成员不适用于进行作独立组件，而应用作其他哪个集合类派生标准功能的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref> to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified <xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref> index.
trans-unit.target: 当前的所有元素都复制<xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref>到一维<xref:System.Array>处指定开始， <xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"> </xref>索引。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class and its members are not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as the class from which other collection classes derive standard functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>类及其成员不适用于进行作独立组件，而应用作其他哪个集合类派生标准功能的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> to copy the current <xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref> object's elements into.
trans-unit.target: 一维<xref:System.Array>要复制当前<xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref>到的对象的元素。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The destination <xref:System.Array> index to start copying into.
trans-unit.target: 目标<xref:System.Array>要开始将复制到索引。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of elements in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中的元素总数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class and its members are not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as the class from which other collection classes derive standard functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>类及其成员不适用于进行作独立组件，而应用作其他哪个集合类派生标准功能的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: The total number of elements in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的元素的总数。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>找不到。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class and its members are not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as the class from which other collection classes derive standard functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>类及其成员不适用于进行作独立组件，而应用作其他哪个集合类派生标准功能的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>找不到。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref>是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class and its members are not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as the class from which other collection classes derive standard functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>类及其成员不适用于进行作独立组件，而应用作其他哪个集合类派生标准功能的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该集合为只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref> is synchonized.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Data.InternalDataCollectionBase"></xref>是同步。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class and its members are not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as the class from which other collection classes derive standard functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>类及其成员不适用于进行作独立组件，而应用作其他哪个集合类派生标准功能的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is synchronized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合已同步;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the items of the collection as a list.
trans-unit.target: 获取列表形式的集合的项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class and its members are not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as the class from which other collection classes derive standard functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>类及其成员不适用于进行作独立组件，而应用作其他哪个集合类派生标准功能的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that contains the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref>包含的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection> class and its members are not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as the class from which other collection classes derive standard functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>类及其成员不适用于进行作独立组件，而应用作其他哪个集合类派生标准功能的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.object> used to synchronize the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.object>用于同步集合。</xref:System.object>
